---
--- Generated by EmmyLua(https://github.com/EmmyLua)
--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2022/1/18 16:22
---@class UIUtils
UIUtils = {}

--- 获取武将 icon -- 通用item 内使用
function UIUtils:getHeroIconByHeroId(heroId)
    return "Img_HeroImg_ReLink"
end

--- 获取武将 框-- 通用item 内使用
function UIUtils:getHeroFrame(quality)
    local tmp = {
        [Enum.HeroQuality.green] = "Panel_HeroGrid1_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.blue] = "Panel_HeroGrid2_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.purple] = "Panel_HeroGrid3_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.orange] = "Panel_HeroGrid4_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.red] = "Panel_HeroGrid5_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.silver] = "Panel_HeroGrid6_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.colourful] = "Panel_HeroGrid7_Common",
    }
    local sp = tmp[quality]
    if sp == nil then
        Logger.error("没有此品质得 框  quality == ",tostring(quality))
        sp = tmp[Enum.HeroQuality.green]
    end
    return sp
end

--- 获取武将 框-- 通用item 内使用
function UIUtils:getHeroBg(quality)
    local tmp = {
        [Enum.HeroQuality.green] = "Panel_HeroGridBg1_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.blue] = "Panel_HeroGridBg2_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.purple] = "Panel_HeroGridBg3_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.orange] = "Panel_HeroGridBg4_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.red] = "Panel_HeroGridBg5_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.silver] = "Panel_HeroGridBg6_Common",
        [Enum.HeroQuality.colourful] = "Panel_HeroGridBg7_Common",
    }
    local sp = tmp[quality]
    if sp == nil then
        Logger.error("没有此品质得 背景图  quality == ",tostring(quality))
        sp = tmp[Enum.HeroQuality.green]
    end
    return sp
end
---@param  prefab GameObject
---@param  prefab GameObject
---@return GameObject
function UIUtils:createItem(prefab,parent)
    if prefab then
        local childGo = GameObject.Instantiate(prefab)
        if parent then
            childGo.transform:SetParent(parent.transform)
        end
        return childGo
    else
        Logger.error(" prefab  不能为空 ！！")
    end

end
